title: Previewing the 'Thrones' Premiere (Ep. 167)
description:
The Ringer's Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald discuss the biggest snubs and indicators from the 2017 Emmy nominations. Then, Mallory Rubin and Jason Concepcion join (23:00) to give their final 'Game of Thrones' thoughts before the Season 7 premiere on Sunday.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
